reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app collects various types of data from users.
reply.reference: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways...URL: https://at-team.org/home/wellness-policy/

source_documents.excerpt:
be subject to, and will be deemed to have accepted the changes in any revised Privacy Policy by your continued use of the Application after the date such revised Privacy Policy is posted.
WHAT INFORMATION DO WE COLLECT?
We may collect information about you in a variety of ways
You provide us information about yourself when you register for and/or use the Service (for example, your goal, experience in breathing meditation, your max inhale and breath hold, email address).
2. Data provided by third...

PRIVACY POLICY
Breeeze, Sleeep+, Sleeepy, StressBall+, Bear·Tots, Blipix, TinyPix, Water.Mate, LottieProfiler, MyBumpee mobile application (the “Application”) together with the content, tools, transactions and other services available by using the App (collectively, the “Service”) is owned and maintained by At team LLC (“we” or “us” or “our”). We are responsible for the collection and proper management of any personal information you submit. We will keep your personal details secure and use the ...

location, and any other data you choose to provide. We record how you interact with our Service (for example, we log your taps on certain areas of the interface and content you interact with, practices you do, the duration of your practices, your course progress, and your subscription orders).
HOW DO WE USE YOUR INFORMATION?
Having accurate information about you allows us to provide you with a smooth, efficient, and customized experience. Specifically, we may use information collected about you ...

as the “Shine The Light” law, permits our users who are California residents to request and obtain from us, once a year and free of charge, information about categories of personal information (if any) we disclosed to third parties for direct marketing purposes and the names and addresses of all third parties with which we shared personal information in the immediately preceding calendar year. If you are a California resident and would like to make such a request, please submit your request in w...

regarding your account or order.
WHO WILL WE SHARE YOUR INFORMATION WITH?
We may share information we have collected about you with third parties that help us operate, provide, improve, integrate, customize, support, and market our Service (for example, Firebase data analytics and cloud storage provider).
If we believe the release of information about you is necessary to respond to legal process, to investigate or remedy potential violations of our policies, or to protect the rights, property, a...

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects data like the user's goal, experience in breathing meditation, max inhale and breath hold, email address, device information, mobile device ID number, model, manufacturer, operating system version, phone number, country, location, user interactions with the service, content interactions, practices, practice duration, course progress, and subscription orders.

content: Device information (e.g., mobile device ID, model, manufacturer)
User interactions with the service and content

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app collects various types of data from users in different ways, including user-provided information, data provided by third parties, and data collected automatically.
reply.reference: User's goal, experience in breathing meditation, max inhale and breath hold, email address, device information, mobile device ID, model, manufacturer, operating system version, phone number, country, location, user interactions with the service, content interactions, practices, practice duration, course progress, and subscription orders. URL: https://at-team.org/home/wellness-policy/

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states the purposes of data collection and use, indicating that the app is transparent about this aspect.

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can request deletion of personal data, as permitted by law. The app will make reasonable efforts to honor the request, with possible legal obligations to retain some data for a certain time.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users have the right to request deletion of personal data, and the app commits to honoring such requests within legal boundaries.
reply.reference: You can request deletion of your personal data, as permitted by law. We will use reasonable efforts to honor your request. In some cases, we may be legally required to keep some of the data for a certain time; in such event, we will fulfill your request after we have complied with our obligations. URL: https://at-team.org/home/wellness-policy/
